report.title: NatureSpot 100 species achievements
report.description: Selects any new achievements of the 100 species challenge.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM custom_cache_tables.naturespot_100_species n1s JOIN users u ON u.id=n1s.user_id AND u.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values v ON v.person_id=u.person_id AND v.deleted=false AND v.person_attribute_id=31 -- email sent AND v.int_value=1 WHERE n1s.date_achieved IS NOT null AND v.id IS null
